search.query: index=$platformMetricsIndex$ | stats values(businessGroup) as bg by businessGroup

panel.title: Runtime Manager - RTF - VCores reserved total - Sandbox - Current Count

single.title: Runtime Manager - RTF - VCores reserved total - Sandbox - Current Count

search.query: index=$platformMetricsIndex$ | eventstats max(_time) as maxTimestamp | where _time=maxTimestamp | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | stats values(runtimeManagerMetrics.rtf.applications.sandbox.coresReserved) as total | stats max(total) as "vcores"

panel.title: Runtime Manager - RTF - VCores reserved - Sandbox - Timeline

chart.title: Runtime Manager - RTF - VCores reserved - Sandbox - Timeline

search.query: index=$platformMetricsIndex$ | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | chart values(runtimeManagerMetrics.rtf.applications.sandbox.coresReserved) as "vcores reserved" by _time, businessGroup

panel.title: Runtime Manager - RTF - Memory reserved total - Sandbox - Current Count

single.title: Runtime Manager - RTF - Memory reserved total - Sandbox - Current Count

search.query: index=$platformMetricsIndex$ | eventstats max(_time) as maxTimestamp | where _time=maxTimestamp | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | stats values(runtimeManagerMetrics.rtf.applications.sandbox.memoryReserved) as total | stats max(total) as "memory"

panel.title: Runtime Manager - RTF - Memory reserved - Sandbox - Timeline

chart.title: Runtime Manager - RTF - Memory reserved - Sandbox - Timeline

search.query: index=$platformMetricsIndex$ | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | chart values(runtimeManagerMetrics.rtf.applications.sandbox.memoryReserved) as "memory reserved" by _time, businessGroup

panel.title: Runtime Manager - Sandbox - RTF - Runtime versions used - Current Count

single.title: Runtime Manager - Sandbox - RTF - Runtimes versions used - Current Count

search.query: index=$platformMetricsIndex$ | eventstats max(_time) as maxTimestamp | where _time=maxTimestamp | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | stats values(runtimeManagerMetrics.rtf.applications.sandbox.runtimesUsedTotal) as total | stats max(total) as "Runtime versions"

panel.title: Runtime Manager - Sandbox - RTF - Runtime versions - Current

table.title: Runtime Manager - Sandbox - RTF - Runtime versions - Current

search.query: index=$platformMetricsIndex$ | eventstats max(_time) as maxTimestamp | where _time=maxTimestamp | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | rename runtimeManagerMetrics.rtf.applications.sandbox.runtimesUsed{} as "Runtime versions" | table "Runtime versions"

panel.title: Runtime Manager - Sandbox - RTF - Runtime versions used - Timeline

chart.title: Runtime Manager - Sandbox - RTF - Runtime versions used - Timeline

search.query: index=$platformMetricsIndex$ | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | chart values(runtimeManagerMetrics.rtf.applications.sandbox.runtimesUsedTotal) as "Runtime versions" by _time, businessGroup

panel.title: Runtime Manager - Sandbox - RTF - Applications - Current Count

single.title: Runtime Manager - Sandbox - RTF - Applications - Current Count

search.query: index=$platformMetricsIndex$ | eventstats max(_time) as maxTimestamp | where _time=maxTimestamp | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | stats values(runtimeManagerMetrics.rtf.applications.sandbox.applicationsTotal) as total | stats max(total) as "Applications"

panel.title: Runtime Manager - Sandbox - RTF - Applications by Status - Current

chart.title: Runtime Manager - Sandbox - RTF - Applications by Status - Current

search.query: index=$platformMetricsIndex$ | eventstats max(_time) as maxTimestamp | where _time=maxTimestamp | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | stats values(runtimeManagerMetrics.rtf.applications.sandbox.applicationsStarted) as started, values(runtimeManagerMetrics.rtf.applications.sandbox.applicationsStopped) as stopped | stats max(started) as "Started", max(stopped) as "Stopped" | transpose

panel.title: Runtime Manager - Sandbox - RTF - Applications by Status - Timeline

chart.title: Runtime Manager - Sandbox - RTF - Applications by Status - Timeline

search.query: index=$platformMetricsIndex$ | search businessGroup IN ($bgToken$) | chart values(runtimeManagerMetrics.rtf.applications.sandbox.applicationsStarted) as "Started", values(runtimeManagerMetrics.rtf.applications.sandbox.applicationsStopped) as "Stopped" by _time, businessGroup
